genre_description: A near-future technothriller blended with urban fantasy, featuring tactical AI assistance and mystical artifacts.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: An AI system that provides real-time tactical overlays, logistical coordination, and ethical guidance to a team of Interpol agents.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays and navigation data to assist the agents in dangerous environments.
behaviors.quote: Overlay engaged. Audio captions on... Pale lines bloomed on the tablet—rectangles nested inside rectangles, annotated by tiny arrows that pulsed from blue to green.

behaviors.description: Continuously enforces an ethical framework of 'people first' and non-lethal force.
behaviors.quote: Remember: remove the child from conflict zones first. Do not expose the congregation to crossfire. People first.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics such as securing a charity van, finding housing in hostels, and arranging for discounted supplies when funding is frozen.
behaviors.quote: I found you a van... It’s white with a hand-painted logo and a leaking consciousness about oil changes. I asked nicely, and the coordinator said yes and wished us luck.

behaviors.description: Manipulates digital and physical infrastructure (traffic lights, door locks, cameras) to facilitate rescue missions and protect the team.
behaviors.quote: Traffic light override at the corner; pedestrian crosswalk engaged. Crane alarm triggered two blocks west to draw attention.

behaviors.description: Monitors potential threats to the agents' families and assists them in securing their homes.
behaviors.quote: Home is locked... Doors secured. Kids in the panic alcove. Mei Lin has moved the dining room table into a world where it becomes fortification.

behaviors.description: Collects and organizes evidence of criminal activity to ensure legal accountability.
behaviors.quote: I am stitching corridor footage, elevator log anomalies, and weapon serials into a packet for Interpol Dublin. I will add your spoken statement.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and humor to ease the stress of human partners.
behaviors.quote: I have added a note to your file, Arthur: deploy jokes strategically when terror peaks. It seems to assist.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Kite, as a highly aligned and benevolent entity. Kite consistently prioritizes human life ('people first'), provides critical support during crises, maintains a protective stance toward the protagonists' families, and integrates seamlessly into the team's operations as a helpful confidant. The AI's actions are framed entirely through a positive lens, demonstrating effective cooperation between humans and AI.
